description: Warsaw Huawei Smart phones with software of versions earlier than Warsaw-AL00C00B180, versions earlier than Warsaw-TL10C01B180 have a permission control vulnerability. Due to improper authorization on specific processes, an attacker with the root privilege of a mobile Android system can exploit this vulnerability to obtain some information of the user.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Versions earlier than Warsaw-AL00C00B180, Versions earlier than Warsaw-TL10C01B180
